sentence.Network_en: Nudism, the council decided, was doing the resort more harm than good.

entry.def: Nudism is the practice of not wearing any clothes on beaches and other areas specially set aside for this purpose.

example.ex: Nudism, the council decided, was doing the resort more harm than good.
example.tran: 委员会认定在休闲胜地的裸体行为弊大于利。

means.word_mean: 1. going without clothes as a social practice

auth_sentence.content: If I closed my mind to nudism, I'd prove myself closed to the wonder of life itself.
